ques: It's not acceptable to remain ________ about important issues.
The instructions were very ________ and easy to follow.
Our team is ________ and includes members from different backgrounds.
The investigation will ________ the truth.
He received a ________ explanation of the project.
It was a challenging journey; ________, we reached our destination.
The ________ data showed a clear trend.
The professor gave an interesting ________ on history.
Public ________ is essential for urban mobility.
Fear can ________ people from taking risks.
We need to ________ the results of the survey.
The document will ________ important information.
The regulations shouldn't ________ innovation.
He was ________ of the potential consequences of his actions.
She attended a ________ on environmental conservation.
They used trucks to ________ the goods.
The weather was bad; ________, we decided to go camping.
She gave me ________ details about the process.
The ________ culture of the city makes it exciting to live in.
I'll give you a ________ summary of the meeting's key points.
Being ________ about the facts can lead to mistakes.
We should embrace ________ perspectives and ideas.
The contract includes ________ clauses about responsibilities.
Anxiety can ________ one's ability to perform well.
The manager had a ________ conversation with the team.
The data analysis will ________ interesting patterns.
The report presents the ________ findings of the study.
The airport has efficient ________ services.
He made mistakes; ________, he learned from them.
The invited speaker delivered a thought-provoking ________.
He's known for his engaging ________s on science.
Can you ________ the secret to me?
The lawyer provided a ________ overview of the case.
Please be ________ in your feedback so we can improve.
The ________ of all the parts creates the final product.
The lack of resources can ________ progress.
The company specializes in the ________ of goods.
Education helps people become less ________ about the world.
The situation was tough; ________, they remained hopeful.
The school promotes ________ learning experiences.
The project aims to improve public ________ systems.
The conference featured ________ speakers from various industries.
His ________ statement left no room for misinterpretation.
I'll be ________ and to the point in my presentation.
The unveiling ceremony will ________ the new monument.
She was unaware and ________ of the situation.
I had doubts; ________, I took the chance.
The university offers a wide range of ________s.
It's essential not to let doubts ________ your creativity.
She had to ________ the scattered information into a coherent report.
